Audio definitions.

Types

AudioDeviceID = distinct uint32
Audio Device instance IDs. 
AudioFormat = distinct uint16
Audio format. 
AudioFormatFlags = distinct cint
Audio format flags. 
AudioPostmixCallback = proc (userdata: pointer; spec: ptr AudioSpec;
                             buffer: ptr cfloat; buflen: cint) {.cdecl, ...gcsafe,
    raises: [].}
AudioSpec {.final, pure.} = object
  format*: AudioFormat       ## Audio data format.
  channels*: cint            ## Number of channels.
  freq*: cint                ## Sample rate (sample frames per second).
  
AudioStreamCallback = proc (userdata: pointer; stream: AudioStreamPtr;
                            additional_amount: cint; total_amount: cint) {.
    cdecl, ...gcsafe, raises: [].}
AudioStreamPtr = ptr AudioStream
Audio stream.

Consts

AUDIO_DEVICE_DEFAULT_CAPTURE = 4294967294'u
AUDIO_DEVICE_DEFAULT_OUTPUT = 4294967295'u
AUDIO_F32 = 33056'u
AUDIO_F32BE = 37152'u
32-bit floating point samples (end endian). 
AUDIO_F32LE = 33056'u
32-bit floating point samples (little endian). 
AUDIO_F32SYS = 33056'u
AUDIO_MASK_BITSIZE = 0x000000FF
AUDIO_MASK_ENDIAN = 4096
AUDIO_MASK_FLOAT = 256
AUDIO_MASK_SIGNED = 32768
AUDIO_S8 = 32776'u
Signed 8-bit samples. 
AUDIO_S16 = 32784'u
AUDIO_S16BE = 36880'u
Signed 16-bit samples (big endian). 
AUDIO_S16LE = 32784'u
Signed 16-bit samples (little endian). 
AUDIO_S16SYS = 32784'u
AUDIO_S32 = 32800'u
AUDIO_S32BE = 36896'u
32-bit integer samples (big endian). 
AUDIO_S32LE = 32800'u
32-bit integer samples (little endian). 
AUDIO_S32SYS = 32800'u
AUDIO_U8 = 8'u
Unsigned 8-bit samples.
